Container classes

Detailed Description

Container classes:.

  • cQueue: a generic queue class
  • cPacketQueue: a queue specialized for message objects (cMessage)
  • cArray: a dynamic array

In addition, one can also use standard C++ container classes like std::vector or std::map. Note that these containers will not show up in Tkenv's inspectors unless you use the WATCH_VECTOR(), WATCH_MAP() macros.
